idea:
Leverage labs is an innovation driven organization with a vision to invent new products for the global audience. Leverage Labs has already envisioned 24 totally new and exciting products, and has started development of the first one. 

The first product is a smart keyboard. It is a wireless device with basic QWERTY key set, and ergonomic levers for commonly performed tasks (eg. copy/paste). The levers provide ease of use, ergonomic strength, motor memory, and fast execute-ability of many tasks which a vast number of people across the world perform on a daily basis. Apart from the levers, the keyboard also features dynamic key-displays. These low-power displays are mounted on top of each key, and can display any font / language / character as programmed - thereby making the keyboard dynamic. 
The keyboard has many more advanced and new-age features which are not available anywhere across the world, making it unique.
name: Leverage Labs

idea: We help in constructing the houses in the which are pending for construction due to issues such as scarcity of money, pending court cases and unavailability of bank loans. We take 50% of the payment from the end consumer and complete the construction of the house. The remaining 50% is paid in instalments (not less than INR 4K) and for a time period of maximum 5 years.
name: IREE CONSTRUCTION INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED
